summary: A high‑level pipeline that performs video‑to‑video translation by applying the FRESCO algorithm on top of Stable Diffusion. It encodes video frames into latent space, conditions the diffusion process with text prompts, ControlNet inputs, LoRA or IP‑Adapter weights, runs the denoising scheduler, decodes the latents back to frames, and optionally filters results through a safety checker.
business_intent: To give creators, marketers, and developers an automated tool for generating stylized or transformed video content from existing footage, while supporting customization (LoRA, textual inversion, IP adapters) and ensuring generated media complies with safety standards.
